scripts.check:tests: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');let f='';try{f=execSync('git diff --name-only --cached').toString().trim();}catch(e){} if(!f)f=execSync('git --no-pager diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD').toString().trim(); if(!f)console.log('No changed files found'); process.env.CHANGED_FILES=f; require('../.github/actions/check-tests/index.js');"
